Title: Authorizes schools to possess and administer FDA approved opioid reversal agents in emergency situations
Summary: Authorizes schools to possess and administer FDA approved opioid reversal agents in emergency situations to negate or neutralize, in whole or in part, the pharmacological effects of an opioid in the human body.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing schools to possess and administer FDA approved opioid reversal agents in emergency situations
